item.title: Krohn-Hite-7008 v2.3.2.21
item.description:
Product: Krohn-Hite-7008 v2.3.2.21
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Fri, 13 Jun 2025 17:00:49 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Drivers and UI for Krohn-Hite 7008 multichannel amplifiers.

Release Notes: [2.3.2]
#30 add getChassis API that returns the number of installed chassis
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Transport v1.9.5.17
item.description:
Product: Transport v1.9.5.17
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Fri, 06 Jun 2025 15:12:38 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: VIs for scripting and performing transport measurments.

[Transport.lvclass]
Basic transport measurments:
- Lockin vs time (Lockin_time.vi)
- Lockin Sweep Mode (Lockin_sweep.vi)

Release Notes: [1.9.5]
#112 Lockin_sweep and Lockin_time will close instruments that they explicitly opened
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: Control Experiment v1.3.0.16
item.description:
Product: Control Experiment v1.3.0.16
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Fri, 06 Jun 2025 14:55:04 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: VIs for scripting and performing transport measurments.

[Control Experiment.lvclass]
- Control Experiment.vi
- provides a uniform way to record information about your sample & device
- record how the lockin is connected to the device
- configure the Krohn Hite amplifier
- set the base path for saving data
- configure peripheral instruments
- APIs for recording sample data, instrument status

Release Notes: [1.3.0]
#105 Check installed KR7008 shunt resistor
#113 Support multiple KH7008
item.dc:creator: Levylab
